metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule identifies when a GCP cloud audit logging removed from a service

ruleText:
rule GCP_audit_logging_removed_from_a_service
{

  meta:
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule identifies when a GCP cloud audit logging removed from a service"
    severity = "Medium"

  events:
    $e.metadata.event_type = "USER_RESOURCE_UPDATE_PERMISSIONS"
    $e.metadata.log_type = "GCP_CLOUDAUDIT"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "SetIamPolicy"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Google Cloud Platform"
    $e.security_result.action = "ALLOW"
    $e.security_result.detection_fields["action"] = "REMOVE"
    $e.principal.user.attribute.labels["authorization_info_resourceService"]= "cloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com"



  condition:
    $e
}
